website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, well-made choice that's approved by the Organization for Bat Conservation.
pros: Stands out for its generous size (can house up to 100 bats)
Users report it's exceptionally sturdy and is still going strong after years of use
cons: A little more expensive than some competitors, but worth the extra money

customer_reviews.title: This bat house is great!!
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for them to find it but now it’s at max capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Krei

customer_reviews.title: We have bats!!!
customer_reviews.text: After hearing how the bat population in Georgia was dwindling and having noticed there were few bat sightings at his home, my som expressed an interest in a bat house. We bought one as part of his birthday. He has a beautiful garden and s pregnant wife who is trying to avoid every mosquito (who knows when Zika becomes prevalent here). The bat house has been up three weeks and he called to say "we have bats!!" My husband and a I are now considering which one fits our property best.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: WE HAVE 80 BATS IN OUR BOX AND WE LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: After waiting almost 2 years we finally have 80 bats in our fantastic bat box and we've noticed a huge difference in the mosquito population, so thanks to the bat conservation for recommending this amazing box, we absolutely love it and we adore our bats.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made with pre-drilled holes for mounting. Now I just hope my ad for rent free space in Bat Vacations Magazine attracts customers.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Where are the bats??
customer_reviews.text: This product is made well but it was difficult to hang on a tree. My husband had to rig it up a bit but once it was attached it seems fine. I've read that it can take several years for bats to migrate to a new home, and it's best to have the box in full sun for at least 8 hours, with 20' of clearance so the bats can fall out of it, and it's best to have several houses near each other. We are still waiting for our bats to arrive; however, we hung this up in June and in the NOrtheast, bats migrate around March. We hope next spring they will find a home in our yard.
customer_reviews.author: SoulShine74

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Have had for many years and is holding up and have had up to 20/25 bats. Thought I had it far enough from the house but the odor was still pungent. I had it mounted on a 4x4 pole at 15 feet up so I could move it further out in the yard in some shade. About 150 feet. So far it has worked from keeping the little bats from nesting in the deck/patio area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and the perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Although we probably won't be putting this bat house out until sometime in the spring, I'm really excited about this product! It has a nice design and it is the PERFECT size for us starters! We have a family cabin set back in 10 acres and the bugs can be just horrible during the summer. We have been meaning to get a bat house for years because we frequently see bats zooming around during the evening hours. I can't wait to try it out and hope that we get a colony moved in!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Ward

customer_reviews.title: The very best you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: All I have to say is WOW! I don’t usually write reviews but this the best, well constructed, perfect in every way Bat house! Let me tell you, I have bats in my attic (which I have removed now) I’m hoping this solves my issue of returning bats trying to re-enter my attic even after sealing every space I can find. I purchased 3 different types of bat houses and BY FAR THIS IS THE ABSOLUTE BEST! I plan on buying more after the other fall apart. Lol
customer_reviews.author: John Matysiak

customer_reviews.title: Natural Pest Control!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bat box to encourage roosting bats around my house. I live in kind of a swampy area and the mosquitos can be so bad its impossible to sit out on the porch some days. the box is well made and will be going up as soon as the weather breaks. I dont like to use chemical sprays and prefer to entice natural predators to deal with pests. This bat box will make a great home for skeeter eaters!
customer_reviews.author: Christy C

customer_reviews.title: I ordered it for my daughter in Indiana. She ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my daughter in Indiana. She already has bats around her house in the evening. Ever since reading Verdy when she was a child she has had real respect for bats! She is thrilled to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Home For Bats
customer_reviews.text: This well built bat house is now adorning the south wall of my home just under the second story eves. I've even enticed a couple of bats to use the home which is good as we don't get a lot of bats around this area.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Was

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful piece of work
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful piece of work. The fit and finish are perfect. The attention to detail is a pleasant surprise. I haven't mounted it yet, but have high hopes for it. Update: the first two years, I only had one bat reside in this bat house, however, I just watched seven bats come home to it this morning. I am pleased beyond words. They must really like it.
customer_reviews.author: VERDEXIPHLUX

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed for a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Really there's not a whole lot to these bat houses but the fact that it comes ready to hang and use is very convenient. They are well put together and look nice. I wish the whole thing was made out of cedar but that's not the case. Haven't seen any bats in the first month that it's been up but hopefully we get some soon! After you see this one you could probably figure out how to construct one yourself pretty easily. But for the cost of this house, it's almost just as easy to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleA

customer_reviews.title: They had a small bat house and this was fantastic for them
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my brother and sister-in-law in Northern California on a 20 acre place. They had a small bat house and this was fantastic for them. They loved the size, quality and that it was from the Bat Conservation organization. In a few months, it is now being used more and more. They placed it near their front porch and love the bug reducing results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First timer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never owned one before, this is our first go at it so I really don’t have anything to compare it to. What I can tell you is that it seems well constructed and looks nice, clean and natural. Can’t wait to hang it and see if we can get some tenants!
customer_reviews.author: Jake S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The first one that I purchased is full of bats.
customer_reviews.author: LBI

customer_reviews.title: Help Save the Bats - for your own good!
customer_reviews.text: We should all become more aware of the balance in nature and do what we can to help endangered critters. I love bats! We have had NO mosquitos, and friends who live here complain about being "eaten up". God bless bats and bees. We can't live without them.
customer_reviews.author: carooney

customer_reviews.title: GOT BATS?
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a friend who has a cabin in the woods and wanted a bat house to attract bats so the mosquito population could be reduced. After doing a lot of reading we choose this bat house mainly because of the amount of bats it can hold and because it is bat organization approved. We felt this was a most important stamp of approval and help the chance of getting them bats in their new house. We hope it will give the the advantage they will need.
customer_reviews.author: TXLinda

customer_reviews.title: would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my sister who lives in Oregon. She is terrified of bats. Job well done. But really this gift got her to research bats and she is less averse to them now. Delivered promptly, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have this to my parents as a gift. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Have this to my parents as a gift. They have noticed more bats on their property than before, but you can't tell if they are using the bathouse or not. Keep in mind that if you live in a cooler environment you will have to paint the house black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put up. Can not say, after two years whether they work or not because I will NOT get near enough to see if there are bats in there!!! Very fast arrival of product and very nice construction... has lasted over 2 years in extreme elements so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for bats
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, sturdy bat box. I'm looking forward to putting it up and hopefully get some bats to live in it.
customer_reviews.author: David Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: I Seems to be well built--cedar wood and screws should help it last. I couldn't have make one for much less than it cost. Wish it was a little bit wider but okay. Hope some bats like it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the perfect safe haven a bat would want
customer_reviews.text: This came assembled and was a snap to hang. We have had it up for two months and I'm not sure if any bats have came to live yet, but I have read it can take some time. Seems like the perfect safe haven a bat would want. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly S Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my outdoorsy son in law!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my son in law. He's a nature lover and he & my daughter live out in the country. It looks sturdy and well made. Son in law is a contractor and he was impressed with the quality. It will go on the side of their barn. I thought it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissyanne

customer_reviews.title: solid, well built box
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and looks great so far. Solid box and nice wood. It's unfinished, so will take a little work to get it ready before hanging. Will report back after we get it installed and (hopefully) have some resident bats!
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Sturdy and good quality craftmens ship. Now I need bats to find it! :)
customer_reviews.author: ryanandcara

customer_reviews.title: Be Patient
customer_reviews.text: Took 3 Years but we have bats now . Do not know how many and I am not going to ask them :) .House is holding up well . Would recommend this to anybody that wants bats. Just be Patient. Put it up and they will come.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: No bats yet
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were impressed by the workmanship and information sheet enclosed. Supposedly it might take a year or two for the bats to find this home. In the meantime, we're waiting and watching.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J Batten

customer_reviews.title: A good size for starts!
customer_reviews.text: I selected this house for my home in the Tampa Bay area of Florida. Near to golf course ponds, the little fluttery-bats should gobble up hoards of little fluttery-buggies. Hah! Go get 'em!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: The unit itself is very sturdy and good build
customer_reviews.text: We just put it up and are now hoping and waiting for some bats to make it their home. The unit itself is very sturdy and good build!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I actually had to return this product as I recieved the same exact one as a gift from some friends (after I had a run in with the local bats...) Product is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hope the bats like it! If so, may have to order the big one!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Goiran- Bevelhimer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, but no bats.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it's been two years and I haven't seen any bats.
customer_reviews.author: A. McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, waiting for the bats to move in.
customer_reviews.author: Plant Lady

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the tree
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the tree. Only been up for one season so hoping that the bats will discover it in the spring. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Goudy

customer_reviews.title: Big box full of bats
customer_reviews.text: Those darn bats keep comin' at ya...well get 'em a place to stay and they will love you for it. Then those bats would be buggin' for better accommodations!
customer_reviews.author: Walter L. Mcghee

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for bats
customer_reviews.text: Just what they had said in the product description, works exactly what they said. I can recommend this to anyone that in need of this.
customer_reviews.author: RAG

customer_reviews.title: I really don't know enough about it at this point ...
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know enough about it at this point. It seems to be well made but I won't know if bats are using it for a while yet..
customer_reviews.author: cameranut

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels solid
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, feels solid, hung up well with my own hardware this summer. I'm not Batman, so I don't know why bats haven't taken up residence, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Bat house realty
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Solid house for these local brownies. I'd recommend this house and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Mount it and they will come!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and properly designed to entice bats to their new home. I have a large colony of brown bats that take residence under my window shutters during the summer months. Can't wait to see them flock to their new home. Predriled holes along the top make it easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: james b ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. Put it up and we're hoping ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Put it up and we're hoping for bats this spring.
customer_reviews.author: tcurrin

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built, and as described. Bought it as a gift, and it was very well received. Don't know yet if any bats have moved in!
customer_reviews.author: Irisheyes

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to encourage bats ti our neighborhood backyard, to help with mosquito control over the summer. It looks great, comes full assembled, and meets all the requirements that are recommended for bat house construction. We just put it up, so no signs of bat yet (could take up to a year.) I will gladly change this to 5 stars if/ when we have some bats move in.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M. Kuivila

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat house
customer_reviews.text: We really like our new bat house. Very sturdy and was easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT FO THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: BUILT PROPERLY BUT NO BATS YET . I KNOW IT TAKES TIME
customer_reviews.author: pambland

customer_reviews.title: night and got here today (Monday) in great condition. Quality is top notch
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Sat. night and got here today (Monday) in great condition. Quality is top notch. Looking forward to setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G Beacher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great box but you really need to order the bat lure a los.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. We have a lot of wetlands in our backyard and therefore a hearty mosquito population. No bat friends yet but we hope they find our backyard buffet by next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Devo

customer_reviews.title: Bats seem to like it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a month ago and didn't put it up for a week. Today we counted at least five separate bats flying around the tree we mounted it on. I followed the directions enclosed with the house, now there are bats. Five stars for (at least) five bats!
customer_reviews.author: A. Moubray

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for the bats to move in.....
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped to me on time. Seems like a solid construction. There was a gouge in the box, but when I inspected the house, there was no damage..... I placed my bat house about 30 feet up a tree. Looks good and love seeing the expressions on people's faces when they ask me what is that hanging in my tree. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! can't wait for the bats to start ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! can't wait for the bats to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Edwards

customer_reviews.title: BAT HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when my bat house arrived. I painted it really cute and hung it on the front of my house. I'm looking forward to my new neighbors (the bats) moving in soon I hope. I like that I'm using a natural exterminator, especially since there's West Nile Virus reported in my area.
customer_reviews.author: ValerieD

customer_reviews.title: Built well
customer_reviews.text: The product is well built. It's been up for over a month now. We don't have any bats yet but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, arrived timely
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality , arrived timely, good instructions, now just awaiting bats
customer_reviews.author: lucinda bacon

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat houses!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped promptly and the bat house adds to the beauty of the back yard and looks to be well built! Looking forward to buying more in the future! Thanks, Capt. Ron
customer_reviews.author: Harold050

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but great
customer_reviews.text: My husband talked about getting one and I kept playing it off as silly. I surprised him on his birthday and got him one. He was super excited. Item is as described and I recommend following instructions for attracting bats. Worked for us
customer_reviews.author: Shopbills

customer_reviews.title: Bat House
customer_reviews.text: I attached this bat house to a very long steel pole that I attached to a wooden fence. I have no bats yet that I can see. I was told it might take 2 years so the house is up and waiting for them to come.
customer_reviews.author: halfsister

customer_reviews.title: Good home for mosquito eaters
customer_reviews.text: This bat house meets the recommendations for bat houses I found in my research. I have not yet mounted it. That looks a little tricky, but it does have two pre-drilled holes in the top. I just need to find the appropriate nails.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mix

customer_reviews.title: Bat House
customer_reviews.text: This bat house is well-made and solid. The mesh it includes is important for the bats to get inside and stay secure once they get into the house. Many models do not have this mesh. I like that it is approved by the Organization for Bat Conservation. They have great expertise in what the design should be for a bat house. Many are not made appropriately for the comfort and safety of the bats.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the other bat houses I have bought
customer_reviews.text: Very well constucted out of cedar using screws rather than staples. This was a gift to be used in Onterio, Canada where the bat population has decreased.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We haven't put it up yet but I was surprised as to how sturdy it was. We are following the suggested procedures and will put it up in our vegetable garden. Hopefully the bats will come!!
customer_reviews.author: dmlopez

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. It was very well made and hopefully will attract bats. I do not think they have put it out yet but either way it looks nice and is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: ... I have not put it up yet but am happy with the house itself it's the first one of ...
customer_reviews.text: this will be my third bat house I have not put it up yet but am happy with the house itself it's the first one of that kind of done
customer_reviews.author: Roger Snyder Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Product was what we were looking for. Well constructed ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was what we were looking for. Well constructed. Will have to wait to make sure it attracts the bats.
customer_reviews.author: Rod MacKinnon

customer_reviews.title: No bats yet, but
customer_reviews.text: A well made product. It takes a while for bats to find the house (providing I put it in a good spot). Did a lot of research and sometimes it takes a while to move in.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: nice durable construction and good design
customer_reviews.text: placed the bat house in accordance with the enclosed directions, we will see just how many bats move into the new bat house, holy bat house batman
customer_reviews.author: George W. Newport

customer_reviews.title: great bat house
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was odd looking and larger than expected but we hung it on the barn and now we do not have bats in the attic any more!
customer_reviews.author: sisterpine

customer_reviews.title: Bats live in it!
customer_reviews.text: My step dad and I both purchased this product for my mother for Christmas. He painted both of them and she loves the boxes. The price is right and the boxes appear to be made out of quality materials. Everything was cut and attached very well (no gaps, no stripped screws, no wood filler.)
customer_reviews.author: Rolaids0

customer_reviews.title: Very highquality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid, well built and study bat house. It is solid wood. The front part is all redwoood. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat house
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. Very well made. It's been up for three weeks now and I just hope the bats find it!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Thomas

customer_reviews.title: As described. I painted it according t directions. ...
customer_reviews.text: As described. I painted it according t directions. after a summer, no bats yet, but will see. Would give 5 stars if I had bats move in.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: She LOVED IT! I can't believe this thing houses 100 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bat house for my boyfriend's mother's birthday. She LOVED IT! I can't believe this thing houses 100 bats!
customer_reviews.author: McKinsey

customer_reviews.title: As pictued.
customer_reviews.text: Bat house came as pictured and seems well built. We have not mounted it outside yet, so I cannot comment of the success of attracting bats right now. I look forward to seeing how it does this summer.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift that was shipped directly to friend so I did not actually see the bat house but I was told it was very well packed and of excellent quality. He was so happy with the gift. He did send me pictures after he put it up and it looked great. I would recommend this bat house.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: No bats in it so far. But the might ...
customer_reviews.text: No bats in it so far. But the might have migrated just as we put it up. Ask me next bat season and I'll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great chritmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Its a christmas for my daughter who had bats in the attic and she was upset about making them move and wanted a home for them so i thought a great chriztmas fift
customer_reviews.author: DIANE BOYKIN

customer_reviews.title: Great construction but when you get it home and realize ...
customer_reviews.text: Great construction but when you get it home and realize how high it has to be mounted, it kind of ruined it for me. I will put it up when I get in a more stable living condition
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Bat house USA made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two bat houses at the same time for a comparison. The other bat house purchased I kept b/c it didn't have the green lining. This one is very well built though and I would have kept it if it weren't for the green.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Seems like quality workmanship with excellent instructions, but...
customer_reviews.text: The company makes it pretty clear that you never know for sure whether you'll get bats or not. We seemed to be in an ideal location, near water, a preserve, plenty of bugs, sun, etc., and put it up high and in the clear. Well over a year later, no bats.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Bat House
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bat house as a Christmas gift for my father. He LOVED it! The product looks exactly like the picture. Hopefully it will become a great home for bats.
customer_reviews.author: Msash

customer_reviews.title: Looker bat house
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a quality item. It is put together with good materials and quality workmanship. The bat house came in a timely manner. I put it up right a way but so far it is not occupied. My understanding is it takes 1 to 2 years for this to take place, so it remains to be seen how much the bats like it. I am satified with the price and speed of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Quality built
customer_reviews.text: The price is a bit more than you can build one for but the craftsmenship and materials are good. Hopefully in the next year or two some bats will find this little palace that I got for them and start eating some of these oversized mosquitoes here in Wisconsin!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Bathouse
customer_reviews.text: this is a top quality, well built, sturdy bathouse and we're glad we ordered 2 from Looker which we plan to put up in the Spring. This is our first attempt knowing they are now in "hybernation" in our part of the country, so we can't yet comment on how well they attract bats but compared to several other products we saw locally before buying on line from Looker, these are far superior in construction. If I were a bat, I can't imagine an nicer abode.
customer_reviews.author: VictSimm

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No bats yet. Wonder how well raw plywood edges will weather. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: madbaker

customer_reviews.title: Looker Single Chamber Bat house
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bat House. The construction is very good. I am trying to get a bat poplulation established now.
customer_reviews.author: Marylin L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: It's an ongoing joke so far....
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but it's vacant after 3 months. We've considered putting an ad in Travelocity to get occupants. I've had 2 in my house since installing it and none in their house.
customer_reviews.author: jane allen

customer_reviews.title: bat box
customer_reviews.text: bats in it the first year we put it up, they like it, but I consider it a bit pricey for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: surey

customer_reviews.title: For husbands birthday
customer_reviews.text: This is a different gift for sure. Should write a review in a year or two after we've had bats move in hoping for them to do just that once they locate and find it meets there approval. Instructions for let and simple to follow..
customer_reviews.author: PATSY B. BALDOCK

customer_reviews.title: Still no bats
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, but still no signs of bats after having it for a year now. Other reviews said it could take up to 3 years for bat to come so I'm still waiting.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: no bats after 2 years...i really wanna move it..but what if im wrong and its a bat in there.
customer_reviews.author: KennyK923

product_meta.title: Looker Songbird Essentials Organization for Bat Conservation (OBC) Single Chamber Bat House
product_meta.description: Holds 100 bats. Designed by the Organization for Bat Conservation, this bat house is made of weather-resistant cedar and features a 3/4” exterior plywood back. An extended landing area allows for easy entrance into the house. Additional features include interior nylon mesh for maneuverability and a ventilation slot that provides air circulation.
feature_bullets: Made of weather-resistant cedar and 3/4 inch exterior grade plywood while nylon mesh lined interior allows bats to maneuver around inside.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
